page.title: 04SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: School life now is a lot easier than in the olden days because we have mechanical things.We also have different subjects every day.Here are the subjects we do on a Monday:- 9:00a.m You get your mark. 9:05a.m You read. 9:45a.m You change for maths. 10:30a.m Break. 10:45a.m Topic. 12:00a.m Lunch,then straight out to break. 1:10p.m Topic. 2:00p.m Music. 2:30p.m Break. 2:45p.m Movement. 3:15p.m Topic or a story. 3:45p.m Home time. My favourite subjects are French,Maths,Games and Reading.My worst subject is movement.
